Chapter 2840: Chapter 1510: The Path Of The Nine Mysteries Is Extremely Cultivable, The Path Of Transcendental Transformation Is Unattainable_2

Chapter 2840: Chapter 1510: The Path of the Nine Mysteries is Extremely Cultivable, The Path of Transcendental Transformation is Unattainable_2

“Do I need nine or ten times the Profound Dao Seeds and Passive Points from before?”

Practice reveals true knowledge.

Xu Xiaoshou didn’t hesitate and exchanged another Profound Dao Seed, bound it to the Way of the Sword Disc, and planted it in the Field of Profound Dao.

“Way of the Sword Disc (18%).”

As expected!

The progress bar didn’t increase at all!

Instantly, Xu Xiaoshou felt both bitterness and joy.

The bitter aspect was that he might be drained completely.

The joyful part was that his great efforts and long performance had not been in vain.

.com

With his current inventory, even if the Way of the Sword Disc could take more, he could probably push it to around “80%”.

And such a greedy “Way of the Sword Disc,” once it really hit “80%,” would represent a qualitative leap.

That was no longer as simple as ten Water Ghosts being bound and forcibly fused together, it was a youthful, undamaged version of Bazhun’an!

Of course…

All these premises were based on the assumption that ten Profound Dao Seeds indeed added 1% to the progress bar.

If not, not only was the understanding of the Path wrong, everything would have to be overturned and started again, and whether he should even target this Great Dao Disc would be up for reconsideration.

One seed, two seeds, three seeds…

After another five Profound Dao Seeds were used, the value finally jumped.

“Way of the Sword Disc (19%).”

Xu Xiaoshou was again in pain but also pleasantly surprised.

Seven Profound Dao Seeds for 1% progress, that’s a lot less than he anticipated…

“Passive Points: 76747194.”

Let’s continue!

Seed after seed of Profound Dao Seeds planted, until his heart jumped with fear, and still the progress didn’t jump.

Finally…

“Passive Points: 75747198.”

“Way of the Sword Disc (20%).”

In an instant, numerous images flooded his mind, all dissecting various Sword Technique Expertise from the inside out, from shallow to deep.

If “Sword Technique Expertise” had given numerous basic knowledge, by observing others’ swordsmanship, one could choose fragments to piece together techniques, replicating those of the various second realms, etc.

The Way of the Sword Disc was like looking down from a high place, turning these techniques into vibrant applications, and further dissected which Sword Flow used which Way of the Sword, which Way of the Sword used which Method…

“Sword” and “Technique” became secondary.

“Path” was the key!

However, for Xu Xiaoshou, the enlightenment was fleeting, and all of this was not the point. The real point was…

“Damn it, so it’s really a 1% progress bar for ten Profound Dao Seeds?”

“I made progress with seven seeds just now, was it because I had some ‘excess’ comprehension upfront?”

It’s a bit expensive.

The variation of ten seeds thoroughly verified Xu Xiaoshou’s idea, making the Way of the Sword Disc even more quantifiable.

Between 20% to the desired 80%, there’s a gap of sixty million!

“Reckless!”

“Passive Points: 74747198.”

“Passive Points: 73747198.”

“Passive Points: 72747198.”

“…”

“Way of the Sword Disc (21%).”

“Way of the Sword Disc (22%).”

“Way of the Sword Disc (23%).”

“…”

Soon, the pain was cast aside, and Xu Xiaoshou immersed himself in the pleasure of Enlightenment.

In the presence of many ancient swordsmen, the Way of the Sword Power Upanishad Formation beneath his feet gradually grew brighter.

Li Fuyu’s eyes widened, filled with shock.

She hadn’t exaggerated before the fight; she really did have a basic understanding of all the Eight Great Sword Techniques other than the emotion sword technique.

Now, she could clearly see the divine path patterns on the Way of the Sword Power Upanishad Formation beneath Xu Xiaoshou’s feet advancing in unison!

“I only used the Heavenly Abandon and Fengdu Sword, how could he, except for the No Sword Arts and Phantom Swords Technique, have gains in each Path, even having insights into the most difficult emotion sword technique?”

“Is it because of the ‘Spiritual Sword Technique·Mountain and Sea’ he used just now, which allowed his Spirit Sword Way to break free from the shackles of the Path of the Ancient Swordsman?”

It wasn’t only Li Fuyu whose eyes shone.

Almost every one of the ancient swordsmen present had high discernment.

Even the younger generation like Lei Shuangxing and Feng Zhongzui had seen much of the world—their elders were that world.

Naturally, everyone could see that Xu Xiaoshou’s direction of Enlightenment was too mixed, too full, but the progress…

It was ridiculously fast!

“This is ‘a little progress’?” Gu Yu was flabbergasted.

After closing her eyes, Xu Xiaoshou seemed even more outrageous than Kui Leihan in the rumors, or he should be called a young version possessed by Bazhun’an!

Even Bazhun’an had to travel to various places in the past, observing landscapes and emotions, spending several years to achieve “instant success” when they desired.

Xu Xiaoshou just fought two battles in Jade Capital City…

Granted, the quality of his opponents was also very high.

But not so absurdly high that his “a little progress” could capture so much!

“Such talent…”

Gu Yu recalled Hallmaster Xuanji’s plans within Saint Hall, suddenly feeling a tinge of irony.

What was Hallmaster Xuanji doing with a delaying tactic?

She was feeding a Taotie of the Ancient Sword Technique… no, a Body of Devour… no, an evolved version.

Whatever came his way, he’d eat it; whatever he learned, he’d use it, and even exceeded expectations!

If this kept up, by the time she fought Xu Xiaoshou again, wouldn’t he have reached the final-stage of the Sword Dao Upanishad?

Even if there were plans at the sacred mountain, waiting for someone or another, could they contend with this mature “Lord Shou” of the Sword Dao?

“No…”

Gu Yu, looking at the increasingly dazzling Power Upanishad Formation, suddenly came to her senses:

Do they still need to fight?

Why hasn’t Xu Xiaoshou finished his comprehension?

If this continues, the challenge would rot in her heart, not even daring to voice it out!

…

“Passive Points: 64747207.”

“Passive Points: 54747216.”

“Passive Points: 44747235.”

“…”

“Way of the Sword Disc (31%).”

“Way of the Sword Disc (41%).”

“Way of the Sword Disc (51%).”

“…”

When the Way of the Sword Disc unknowingly broke through the 50% mark, Xu Xiaoshou could clearly understand the Second World above Abyss Island described by Big Mouth Xiao.

He could even infer the basic foundational roots of Swordsmanship from that Second World.

His life…
